participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, Liam enjoys exploring different narratives through his writing.
participant_1.background: I'm not comfortable sharing my ethnic background. last season i was just getting started. my favorite food is mashed potatoes. i am the youngest of five. i write fiction for fun.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Sophie is sociable and enjoys connecting with others through shared experiences and creativity.
participant_2.background: I collect memories and photographs of my friends and family. I do my laundry when I run out of clean clothes. i like to dance with my friends. I used to go to subway with my dad. i love folk metal.

content.text: Good! Just got back from dancing with friends! You?
I'm doing alright.  Wrote a lot of fiction today.
Oh that's cool! I like to write, too. What genres do you like to write?
I love sci-fi and fantasy. And I'm trying to write a memoir.
That's awesome! I've never tried memoir writing. Maybe I'll give it a try. Do you have any advice for a new writer?
Just write what you feel and don't let anyone tell you otherwise. If you're passionate about it, it will show through in your writing.
Thanks for the advice! I'm really excited to start writing more.
